qas.question: What is the average size of chickens used extensively for it's meat production raised in an intensive environment?
How long does it take for an broiler raisedin an intensive environment very to reach optimum size?
What is the death rate among chickens who are intensivley breed to be broilers?
Do chicken raised in the intensive broiler method suffer from health condions?

answers.text: their legs cannot always support their weight and their hearts and respiratory systems may not be able to supply enough oxygen to their developing muscles.

qas.question: How long does it take for a chicken raised in a less intensive envionment to reach optimal broiler size?
What are chickens raised only for their fashion sense known as?
How long does it take a broiler to reach gargantuan size?
What is the death rate among chickens who are intensively bred to be fried chicken?

plausible_answers.text: their legs cannot always support their weight and their hearts and respiratory systems may not be able to supply enough oxygen to their developing muscles

qas.question: Why are broilers considered to be very healthy chickens?

plausible_answers.text: hung by their feet, stunned, killed, bled, scalded, plucked, have their heads and feet removed, eviscerated, washed, chilled, drained, weighed, and packed
